text: In Every Woman's Life is a 1924 American drama film directed by Irving Cummings and written by Albert S. Le Vino. It is based on the 1920 novel Belonging by Olive Wadsley. The film stars Virginia Valli, Lloyd Hughes, Marc McDermott, George Fawcett, Vera Lewis, and Ralph Lewis. The film was released on September 28, 1924, by Associated First National Pictures.Progressive Silent Film List: In Every Woman's Life at silentera.com ==Cast== *Virginia Valli as Sara Langford *Lloyd Hughes as Julian Greer *Marc McDermott as Count Coti Desanges *George Fawcett as Douglass Greer *Vera Lewis as Diana Lansdale *Ralph Lewis as Captain *Stuart Holmes as Charles Carleton *John St. Polis as Dr. Philip Logan ==Preservation== With no copies of In Every Woman's Life located in any film archives,Library of Congress American Silent Feature Film Survival Database: In Every Woman's Life it is a lost film. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1924 films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American drama films Category:1924 drama films Category:First National Pictures films Category:Films directed by Irving Cummings Category:American silent feature films Category:American black-and-white films
